Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Creates an affordable housing relief fund program to preserve affordable multifamily residential properties located in New York state
Summary: Creates an affordable housing relief fund program to preserve affordable multifamily residential properties located in New York state.
LawCode: Add Art 33 §§1300 - 1307, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to creating an affordable housing relief fund program to preserve affordable multifamily residential properties located in New York state
